forms.budget_items_description: Bellow is the list of the expenses made againt the budget which will account to the total "Used" amount. Feel free to modify their details as needed.
forms.form_budget_description: A budget keeps track of your expenses so you can be in control of your money by being within the budget "Total Quota".
forms.form_expense_description: A expense is a planned, allocated, and anticipated cost within your budget.
forms.form_installment_description: A installment is a payment you make to repay the loan.
forms.form_loan_description: A loan keeps track of the installments paid against the loan "Total Debt" that you collect from your debtor or that you owe somebody.
forms.label_loan_type: Is the loan For or Against?
forms.loan_items_description: Bellow is the list of the installments made againt the loan which will account for total "Paid" amont. Feel free to modify their details as needed.
forms.no_expense_items: You have no expenses yet. Get started tracking your budget by adding a expense.
forms.no_installment_items: You have no installments yet. Get started tracking your loan repayments by adding a installment.

modals.description_move_items: Here you can move {items} to another {parent}.
modals.label_select_items: Select the {items} to be moved to the new {parent}.
modals.message_select_item: You have to select at least one {item}.
modals.message_select_new_parent: You have to select a new {parent}.

alert_dialogs.alert_delete_description_entry: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this [{type}] as well as its associated [{items}].
alert_dialogs.alert_delete_description_item: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this [{type}].

server_messages.error_budget_not_unique: Budget name={name} already exists. Please insert a different name.
server_messages.error_todo_not_unique: Error: task with name={name} already exists.
server_messages.error_creating_budget: There was an error creating your budget
server_messages.error_creating_expense: There was an error creating your expense
server_messages.error_creating_installment: There was an error creating your installment
server_messages.error_creating_loan: There was an error creating your loan
server_messages.error_creating_todo: There was an error creating your task
server_messages.error_deleting_budget: There was an error deleting your budget
server_messages.error_deleting_expense: There was an error deleting your expense
server_messages.error_deleting_installment: There was an error deleting your installment
server_messages.error_deleting_loan: There was an error deleting your loan
server_messages.error_deleting_todo: There was an error deleting your task
server_messages.error_loan_not_unique: Loan name={name} already exists. Please insert a different name.
server_messages.error_moving_expenses: There was an error moving your expenses
server_messages.error_moving_installments: There was an error moving your installments
server_messages.error_saving_budget_expenses: There was an error saving your budget expenses
server_messages.error_saving_loan_installments: There was an error saving your loan installments
server_messages.error_updating_budget: There was an error updating your budget
server_messages.error_updating_loan: There was an error updating your loan
server_messages.error_updating_todo: There was an error updating your task

metadata.meta_description: The Easy Budgets app is built with Next.js 15, Clerk, Neon and Tailwind CSS

home.hero_welcome_header: Manage budgets and loans, the easy way!
home.hero_welcome_message: One centralized place to manage your budgets and loans. Now with a bonus todo list.

dashboard.get_started_budget: Get started with Easy Budgets by creating a budget
dashboard.get_started_loan: Get started with Easy Budgets by creating a loan

todos.empty_todos: Oops! You have no tasks yet
todos.get_started_todos: Please add a new task to get started.
todos.warning_unsupported_browser: Your browser does not support Speech Recognition.
